name: Usagi Yojimbo: Way of the Ronin - FREE
name_original: Usagi Yojimbo: Way of the Ronin - FREE
description:
This is the FREE version of Usagi Yojimbo: Way of the Ronin, which features one free level. This is the new game based on the classic Dark Horse Comic Graphic Novels by Stan Sakai. Travel with Miyamoto Usagi on an epic journey, battling over 50 enemy types and 13 boss monsters pulled right from the comics! Wield the legendary sword Grasscutter as you travel across feudal Japan in a tale to restore order to the land.
The Full Game Has:
•13 Action Packed Levels
•Over 50 different enemy types & 13 Boss Monsters right from the comics!
•Epic Storyline, approved by Stan Sakai!
•Unlock over a dozen Combos and Special Attacks as you progress through the game!
